entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 03 March 2023
